body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Timothy Edwards and the customer's name is Sandra Thompson.  The conversation is about a random business (a Movie Theater ) and is a conversation about billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Timothy Edwards, and I am with Stellar Movie Theater. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Timothy, I'm Sandra Thompson. I have a billing question regarding my last visit.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra! I'd be happy to help with that. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero two - four five six - one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. And could you also provide your email address so I can look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Let me pull up your account. I see that you were charged for two tickets along with some snacks. Is that correct?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that's right. But I think I was overcharged for the snacks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for any confusion. Let me check the pricing details for you. Just a moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Sandra! I can confirm that the snack pricing was indeed higher than expected. We will resolve this immediately.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Timothy!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sandra! Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
